The tweet from Eric Trump: s account that was being scrutinized and claimed to be evidence of prior knowledge about the airstrike.
The context of the tweet: which was in response to a video posted by Jack Posobiec showing the arrival of US Marines at the US embassy in Iraq.
The timing of the tweet: which was on December 31, 2019, two days before the airstrike took place.
The content of the tweet: which referred to the Marines arriving at the embassy and did not indicate any knowledge or reference to the upcoming drone strike.
